myWork.text1-Project1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and Organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
myWork.text3-Project1: I learned a variety of skills. My JavaScript knowledge was tested in combination with Firebase, which gave me a whole new understanding of how programming works. Additionally, I learned to organize myself within a team and take responsibility for deadlines.
myWork.text4: I am currently working on developing anonline shop for pet foods.This is for me both exciting andchallenging. In my work the key tosuccess lies in a good planning andexecution.

myWork2.text1-Project1: Mafia 5 is a Jump, Run and Shoot Game. Help Fernando find and eliminate the criminal San Davis.
myWork2.text3-Project1: The focus in Mafia 5 is Object-oriented with class-based programming to to develop a well-designed game with complex tasks such as collision detection.

whyme.text1: I am always motivated to learn new technologies and continuously develop my skills. My ability to tackle complex challenges, combined with my passion for programming, makes me a valuable member of your team.

myskills.text1: The IT industry is evolving rapidly, with new technologies and methodologies constantly emerging. To continuously enhance my IT skills, I rely on a forward-thinking approach, a curious mindset, and a strong commitment to lifelong learning.
myskills.text2: I am always happy to learn new technologies,just tell me what you meed.

reference.text1: Working with Eduard on our Kanban board project was truly enriching. His creative ideas took the project to a whole new level. You could see how curious he is and how much he enjoys developing himself.
reference.text2: Eduard is a reliable and motivated team player. He brings not only technical skills but also a positive attitude that enriches the entire team
reference.text3: Eduard is a friendly and helpful colleague who quickly familiarizes himself with new topics. His structured approach to tasks leads to excellent results.
reference.headline: Need a teamplayer?
reference.subline: Here what my colleagues said about me

letuswork.text2: If you're looking for someone for your next project—whether it's a business app or something else—and you value clean code and a dedicated developer who is eager to grow and learn new things, then I'm the right fit for you.
